FuncDef:
The ssl verify-ip command configures the NMS IP address needed to be authenticated.
The undo dcn connect-mode command deletes the NMS IP address.
By default, not to authenticate the NMS IP address.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To improve the security for TCP connections between a GNE and its connected NMSs, run the ssl verify-ip command to authenticate NMS IP addresses, to check whether the IP addresses are the same as them in certificate.
Prerequisites
The DCN feature has been enabled globally using the dcn command in the system view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
